languages.text: "Мощь души данной единицы исходит не из плоти, что слаба и ущербна, но из металла, не знающего износа. Она может быть сломана, но не сломлена".
"The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."
languages.original_text: "Мощь души данной единицы исходит не из плоти, что слаба и ущербна, но из металла, не знающего износа. Она может быть сломана, но не сломлена".

traits.locale_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."
"The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."
"The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."
"The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

languages.text: “本单位的灵魂力量并非来自于脆弱残缺的肉体，而是来自永不退化的金属。金属可能会产生裂痕，但永远不会破碎。”
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: “本单位的灵魂力量并非来自于脆弱残缺的肉体，而是来自永不退化的金属。金属可能会产生裂痕，但永远不会破碎。”

languages.text: « La puissance de l'âme de l'unité ne réside pas dans sa chair, qui n'est que faiblesse, mais dans le métal, qui ne connaît pas aucune dégradation. Il peut se briser, mais jamais complètement. »
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: « La puissance de l'âme de l'unité ne réside pas dans sa chair, qui n'est que faiblesse, mais dans le métal, qui ne connaît pas aucune dégradation. Il peut se briser, mais jamais complètement. »

languages.text: «El poder del alma de esta unidad no está en la carne, débil y defectuosa, sino en el metal, que no se degrada. Puede romperse, pero no quebrantarse».
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: «El poder del alma de esta unidad no está en la carne, débil y defectuosa, sino en el metal, que no se degrada. Puede romperse, pero no quebrantarse».

languages.text: 「当ユニットが持つ魂の力は、弱く欠陥を抱えた肉体から生じるものにあらず、劣化を知らぬ金属から生じるものである。故障はすれど、壊れることなどない」
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: 「当ユニットが持つ魂の力は、弱く欠陥を抱えた肉体から生じるものにあらず、劣化を知らぬ金属から生じるものである。故障はすれど、壊れることなどない」

languages.text: "Die Macht der Seele dieser Einheit entspringt nicht dem Fleisch, welches schwach und mangelhaft ist, sondern dem Metall, welches keinen Verfall kennt. Es mag brechen, doch es ist nie gebrochen."
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: "Die Macht der Seele dieser Einheit entspringt nicht dem Fleisch, welches schwach und mangelhaft ist, sondern dem Metall, welches keinen Verfall kennt. Es mag brechen, doch es ist nie gebrochen."

languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

languages.text: "Bu birimin ruhundaki kudret, zayıf ve kusurlu etinden ziyade asla bozunmayan metalden geliyor. Darbe alabilir ama asla parçalanmaz."
languages.original_text: "The might of this unit's soul originates not in the flesh, which is weak and defective, but in metal, which knows no degradation. It may break, but it is never broken."

traits.locale_text: "Bu birimin ruhundaki kudret, zayıf ve kusurlu etinden değil asla bozunmayan metalden geliyor. Darbe alabilir ama asla kırılmaz."
